result.eng: We do the same thing year after year.
result.ga: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh bliana
result.orig: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh bliana
result.html: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh blianaWe do the same thing year after year.
result.ponchtml: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaiḋ blianaWe do the same thing year after year.

result.eng: As it happens, I work in the same company.
result.ga: Mar a tharlaíonn tá mise ag obair sa chomhlacht céanna
result.orig: Mar a tharlaíonn tá mise ag obair sa chomhlacht céanna
result.html: Mar a tharlaíonn tá mise ag obair sa chomhlacht céannaAs it happens, I work in the same company.
result.ponchtml: Mar a ṫarlaíonn tá mise ag obair sa ċoṁlaċt céannaAs it happens, I work in the same company.

result.eng: She doesn't speak as much as you.
result.ga: Ní labhraíonn sí an oiread céanna leatsa
result.orig: Ní labhraíonn sí an oiread céanna leatsa
result.html: Ní labhraíonn sí an oiread céanna leatsaShe doesn't speak as much as you.
result.ponchtml: Ní laḃraíonn sí an oiread céanna leatsaShe doesn't speak as much as you.

result.eng: Immigrants do not have the same rights as citizens.
result.ga: Níl na cearta céanna ag na hinimircigh agus atá ag na saoránaigh
result.orig: Níl na cearta céanna ag na hinimircigh agus atá ag na saoránaigh
result.html: Níl na cearta céanna ag na hinimircigh agus atá ag na saoránaighImmigrants do not have the same rights as citizens.
result.ponchtml: Níl na cearta céanna ag na hinimirciġ agus atá ag na saoránaiġImmigrants do not have the same rights as citizens.

result.ga: Sin é an duine céanna
result.html: Sin é an duine céannaThat's the same person.
result.ponchtml: Sin é an duine céannaThat's the same person.

result.eng: I must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ga: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.orig: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.html: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ gur ḃuail mé leo uair nó ḋó ó d'iṫ muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.

result.eng: We went to the city centre on the same bus.
result.ga: Chuaigh muid go lár na cathrach ar an bhus céanna
result.orig: Chuaigh muid go lár na cathrach ar an bhus céanna
result.html: Chuaigh muid go lár na cathrach ar an bhus céannaWe went to the city centre on the same bus.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ muid go lár na caṫraċ ar an ḃus céannaWe went to the city centre on the same bus.
